00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Text;
00026 using System.Xml;
00027 #endregion
00028 
00029 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.APMLHelper
00030 {
00034     public class Body
00035     {
00036         #region Constructors
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040         public Body()
00041         {
00042         }
00043 
00048         public Body(XmlElement Element)
00049         {
00050             if (Element.Name.Equals("body", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00051             {
00052                 if (Element.Attributes["defaultprofile"] != null)
00053                 {
00054                     DefaultProfile = Element.Attributes["defaultprofile"].Value;
00055                 }
00056                 foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00057                 {
00058                     try
00059                     {
00060                         if (Child.Name.Equals("profile", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00061                         {
00062                             Profiles.Add(new Profile((XmlElement)Child));
00063                         }
00064                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("Applications", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00065                         {
00066                             Applications = new Applications((XmlElement)Child);
00067                         }
00068                     }
00069                     catch { }
00070                 }
00071             }
00072         }
00073         #endregion
00074 
00075         #region Properties
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079         public string DefaultProfile
00080         {
00081             get { return _DefaultProfile; }
00082             set { _DefaultProfile = value; }
00083         }
00084         private string _DefaultProfile="";
00085 
00089         public List<Profile> Profiles
00090         {
00091             get { return _Profiles; }
00092             set { _Profiles = value; }
00093         }
00094         private List<Profile> _Profiles=new List<Profile>();
00095 
00099         public Applications Applications
00100         {
00101             get { return _Applications; }
00102             set { _Applications = value; }
00103         }
00104         private Applications _Applications=null;
00105         #endregion
00106 
00107         #region Overriden Functions
00108         public override string ToString()
00109         {
00110             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00111             Builder.Append("<Body defaultprofile=\""+DefaultProfile+"\">");
00112             foreach (Profile Profile in Profiles)
00113             {
00114                 Builder.Append(Profile.ToString());
00115             }
00116             Builder.Append(Applications.ToString());
00117             Builder.Append("</Body>");
00118             return Builder.ToString();
00119         }
00120         #endregion
00121     }
00122 }
